QuestData.Title: A Good Heart
QuestData.Description:
Despite the beliefs of most people, Emeni has a kind heart. Err...at least she will have one, once you give it to her!
I can think of no one better than you, Maw Walker, to give Emeni a new heart. Perhaps this will warm her blood towards you. You might become friends or even soulbinds!
Please select and place a heart in Emeni's construct.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a heart in Emenis' construct.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it, the construct is completed. The Slaughter Daughter lives again!
